content: Hi, I need documentation for the people who should be able to develop CQL based on FHIR after a walkthrough of the document.
@Narayan Chalise , lots of resources available here: https://github.com/cqframework/CQL-Formatting-and-Usage-Wiki/wiki/Getting-Started
There are also HL7 Tutorials available in on-demand education, and there is another one this year.
There are also monthly Cooking with CQL, CQM, and FHIR sessions, also linked from that list of resources.
